columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: GTM_TRANS_LINE_TEXT_LINK_GID
columns.description: The GID for the link between the GTM trade transaction line and the associated text template.

columns.name: GTM_TRANS_LINE_TEXT_LINK_XID
columns.description: The XID for the link between the GTM trade transaction line and the associated text template.

columns.name: GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_TRANSACTION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM trade transaction.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_DEF_GID
columns.description: The GID for the document type associated with the GTM trade transaction line text template.

columns.name: TEXT_TEMPLATE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the text template associated with the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: TEXT_OVERRIDE
columns.description: Transactional override for the template on the specific document

columns.name: GTM_COMPLIANCE_RULE_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM compliance rule set group used to assign a text template to a trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_COMPLIANCE_RULE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM compliance rule used to assign a text template to a trade transaction line.
